results.title: Simvastatin suppresses breast cancer cell proliferation induced by senescent cells
results.text_hl: They also suggest that senescent cells, which accumulate after radio/chemo therapy, promote @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004700 @@@endocrine resistance@@@ in @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ and that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might suppress this resistance.

citations.NLM: Liu S, Uppal H, Demaria M, Desprez PY, Campisi J, Kapahi P. Simvastatin suppresses breast cancer cell proliferation induced by senescent cells Sci Rep. 2015 Dec 14;5():17895. PMID: 26658759
citations.BibTeX: @article{26658759, title={Simvastatin suppresses breast cancer cell proliferation induced by senescent cells}, author={Liu S and Uppal H and Demaria M and Desprez PY and Campisi J and Kapahi P}, journal={Sci Rep}, volume={5}, pages={17895}}

results.title: Simvastatin affect the expression of detoxification-related genes and enzymes in Daphnia magna and alter its life history parameters.
results.text_hl: The long-term chronic exposure (21 days) may cause the changes of life history parameters such as decreasing total egg production number per individual and intrinsic growth rates etc. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ may act as a potential @<m>DISEASE_Endocrine_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004700 @@@endocrine disruptor@@@ to @SPECIES_35525 @@@D. magna@@@ and the reproduction parameters were more sensitive endpoints than the survival and growth for evaluating @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ exposure.

citations.NLM: Liu Y, Ding R, Pan B, Wang L, Liu S, Nie X. Simvastatin affect the expression of detoxification-related genes and enzymes in Daphnia magna and alter its life history parameters. Ecotoxicol Environ Saf. 2019 Oct 30;182():109389. PMID: 31272027
citations.BibTeX: @article{31272027, title={Simvastatin affect the expression of detoxification-related genes and enzymes in Daphnia magna and alter its life history parameters.}, author={Liu Y and Ding R and Pan B and Wang L and Liu S and Nie X}, journal={Ecotoxicol Environ Saf}, volume={182}, pages={109389}}
